intents.title: Greeting
intents.answer: Hello, how may I be of help today?

intents.title: About Smart Academy
questions: Can you explain what Smart Academy is?
intents.answer: Smart Academy is an online learning platform developed by the ICT Authority to enable Kenyan citizens to access digital training.

intents.title: Target Audience
questions: Who can benefit from Smart Academy?
Can I study from Smart Academy?
intents.answer: Anyone looking to improve their digital skills, including professionals, students, and public servants, can benefit from Smart Academy.

intents.title: Mobile Access
questions: Can I access Smart Academy on my phone?
Does Smart Academy work on smartphones?
intents.answer: Yes, the platform is responsive and can be accessed on smartphones, tablets, and laptops.

intents.title: Payment
questions: How do I pay for a course?
How can I make a payment on Smart Academy?
What is the payment method for Smart Academy courses?
intents.answer: Payments are made through eCitizen using Paybill number 222222.

intents.title: Certification
questions: Do I receive a certificate after completing the course?
intents.answer: Yes. Upon completion of the course and assessments, an e-certificate is issued.

intents.title: Course Levels
questions: What are some of the course levels?
intents.answer: There are currently 4 levels namely: 1) Foundational, 2) Basic, 3) Intermediate, 4) Advanced
